definitions.definition: On a wind instrument, to articulate a note by starting the air with a tap of the tongue, as though by speaking a 'd' or 't' sound ( alveolar plosive ).
examples: Playing wind instruments involves tonguing on the reed or mouthpiece.

definitions.definition: To manipulate with the tongue, as in kissing or oral sex ; to perform cunnilingus or anilingus on.
To protrude in relatively long, narrow sections.
examples: a soil horizon that tongues into clay

definitions.definition: To join by means of a tongue and groove .

main_definition: ( music , ambitransitive ) On a wind instrument, to articulate a note by starting the air with a tap of the tongue, as though by speaking a 'd' or 't' sound ( alveolar plosive ).
secondary_definitions: ( slang , vulgar , transitive ) To manipulate with the tongue, as in kissing or oral sex ; to perform cunnilingus or anilingus on.
To protrude in relatively long, narrow sections.
To join by means of a tongue and groove .
( intransitive , obsolete ) To talk ; to prate .
( transitive , obsolete ) To speak; to utter.
( transitive , obsolete ) To chide; to scold.
